text: Ryan Lawler (born April 9, 1987) is an American former stock car racing driver. Lawler competed in 8 races in the 2008 NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series. His best finish was 17th, which he achieved at Martinsville and Kentucky. Lawler finished 35th in the point standings. ==Motorsports career results== ===NASCAR=== (key) (Bold – Pole position awarded by qualifying time.
